Package de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker

Interface Summary
TypeCheckerProofContext The proof context for the type checker.
TypeCheckerProofNode Base interface to nodes in a TypeCheckerProofModel.
TypeCheckerProofRule Base interface for the proof rules used within the type checker.
TypeEnvironment Base interface to the type environments used within the type checker.
TypeSubstitution Instances of this class are used to represents substitutions on types.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule Abstract base class for implementations of the TypeCheckerProofRule interface.
AbstractTypeCheckerProofRuleSet Abstract base class for type checker proof rule sets.
DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext Default implementation of the TypeCheckerProofContext interface.
DefaultTypeCheckerProofNode Default implementation of the TypeCheckerProofNode interface.
DefaultTypeEnvironment Default implementation of the TypeEnvironment interface.
DefaultTypeSubstitution Default implementation of the TypeSubstitution interface.
TypeCheckerProofModel The heart of the type checker.
TypeEquation Represents a type equation.
TypeEquationList A list of TypeEquations, in the same fashion as a list in OCaml.
TypeUtilities This class contains only static methods that serve as utility functions for implementing various parts of the type checker and the type system in general.
 

Exception Summary
UnificationException Exception to indicate that an error occurred during the unification algorithm, i.e. that a type equation could not be unified.
